entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multi-window memory leak #10029
  • Unable to make a circle image with a circle border with a stroke thickness #10027
  • DisplayAlert popup on multiple open windows #10026
  • Setting CollectionView.SelectedItem = null does nothing #10025
    .NET 6 + Servicing
  • [Android] Unable to change App.MainPage inside OnResume() #10024
  • Previous queries are passed to ApplyQueryAttribute when switching the pages by flyout item #10022
  • Network is not reachable. Please check your connection and try again. #10020
  • PNG images are not generated from SVGs for MAUI libraries targeting Android or iOS #10019
  • Issue with focusing element with .focus() #10016

Closed

  • .NET Multi-platform App UI development is not an Option #10012
  • HasUnevenRows=True and Image in ItemTemplate causes InvalidOperationException #7964
    Backlog
  • [Android] Window overlay is not working with Shell #9646
    Backlog
  • [Android] VisualDiagnostic Adorners not being drawn if app is wrapped in Shell. #8866
    7.0-rc2
  • Layout of Grid contents not updated when IsVisible changes #9850
  • Modify our templates to include a better version for iOS or build SupportedPlatforms into our targets #6996
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Can't assign x:Name to GradientStop #9841
    7.0-rc2
  • Problem with publish MAUI Project with reference on iOS platform #9981
  • ios launch confront black screen #9482

PullRequests

Created

  • Make window.frame work #10028
    do-not-merge
  • [Housekeeping] Complete pending TODOs in Core #10015
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Font inline docs #10014
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix crash with second window and WebView #10013
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, high, control-webview

Merged

  • Delete label-partner-issues.yml #10023
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add adorner layer to CoordinatorLayout #10001
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖
  • Lower Catalyst/iOS SupportedOSPlatformVersion #9997
    platform/iOS 🍎
  • Enable Graphics API docs generation #9675
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add Release Schedule doc #9982
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Dispatcher inline docs #9943
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Remove Assert Not Null check on HashCode test #10009
  • Use the new public SkiaSharp #10008
    6.0-sr5

Updated

  • Update Package.appxmanifest to have PhonePublisherId #9477
    partner/winui, do-not-merge, community ✨
  • [Essentials] Fixes IPreferences DateTime handling #9974
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22451.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22452.2 #9922
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Validate image format before resize in Resintetizer #9986
    t/bug, area/single project ☝️
  • Update docs animations #9746
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add visual state for PointerEntered #10003
    area/Xaml </>
  • Fix root page swapping #9955
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, 7.0-rc2
  • [Android] Fix rendering using WebView without Source #9916
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Allow custom layout managers for existing layout types in Controls #9980
    area/layout 🔲
